## 

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| eval: false
library(patchwork)

ggplot(y, aes(x = y)) + scale_x_continuous(n.breaks = 20, limits = c(50, 200)) +
  geom_boxplot() + theme_void() +
ggplot(y, aes(x = y)) + 
  geom_histogram() + scale_x_continuous(n.breaks = 20, limits = c(50, 200)) + scale_y_continuous(n.breaks = 10) +
  geom_vline(aes(xintercept = median(y))) +
#box + hist + 
  plot_layout(nrow = 2, heights = c(0.2, 4))
```


```{r}
ggplot(y, aes(x = y)) + 
  geom_histogram() + scale_x_continuous(n.breaks = 20) + scale_y_continuous(n.breaks = 10) +
  geom_vline(aes(xintercept = median(y)))
```


```{r}
y <- y |> mutate(height = y, age = howell$age, male = as_factor(howell$male))

ggplot(y, aes(x = height, fill=factor(round(age)))) + guides(fill = FALSE) +
  geom_histogram() + scale_x_continuous(n.breaks = 20) + scale_y_continuous(n.breaks = 10) + 
  scale_fill_grey(start = 0.9, end = 0.1)
```



##

```{r}
y <- y |> mutate(x = howell$age, z = as_factor(howell$male))

#theme_set(theme_bw())

  geom_point(alpha = 0.7) + scale_x_continuous(n.breaks = 10) + scale_y_continuous(n.breaks = 10) + 
  labs(title = "", x = "x", y = "y", colour = "") + 
  theme(legend.position = c(0.92,0.16)) +
  scale_color_manual(name = "Sex", labels = c("Female", "Male"), values = c(100,200))
```
